name: Lamplight
startIntroPart1: Hail, General Jalindra Lendlock! President of the glorious nation of Lamplight! You took the side of freedom, and proudly fought against Degla, the most powerful empire on Martica, to free the newly colonized lands from oppression. Elected almost 100 years later, you led the young nation of Lamplight through a new crisis when extra-dimensional invaders attacked, putting the fate of the entire multiverse in jeopardy.
startIntroPart2: President Jill, your people have elected you once more. Will to lead them through difficult times again? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your people will thank us for liberating them from the dark ages.
defeated: If we are to die, then we will die standing.
introduction: Behold the great nation of Lamplight. Please allow us to share our gift of civilization with you.
tradeRequest: A shared prosperity is the foundation of all great nations.
declaringFriendship: Will you join the architects of history?

name: Rendurn
declaringWar: This world is ours by birthright, and yours by conquest. Fight for it.
attacked: I just wanted to build wonders...
defeated: Build something to celebrate your victory, and remember our defeat.
denounced: We have skin made of iron.
hateHello: To thine own self, be true.
tradeRequest: You want to build, I want to build, it just makes sense.
uniques: [+2 Culture, +2 Gold, +2 Production] from every [Mountain]
Comment [Has access to a unique [Worker] unit with the ability to convert one tile into a different terrain type, after which the unit is consumed]
[10] free [Worker] units appear
